/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ import React from "react"; import "./Shared.css"; import "./Collaboration.css"; import "./Footer.css"; import { Footer } from "./Footer"; export const Collaboration: React.FC = () => { return (

Would you like to partner with us?

We come from a wide range of backgrounds, both from the academic world and the corporate. We're always open to collaboration with people and companies that are interested in mental health and share our values.

Our interests.

We work with software tools like Unity, Blender, Meshroom, Meshlab and R. We like hardware too, EEG, GSR, eye trackers and of course, XR. And we like research in neuroscience, neural nets, graph theory, 'Bayesian' psychology, systemic psychotherapy, cognitivist therapy, reality therapy, systems engineering, cybernetics, structural-functionalism and branching morphogenesis.

Would you like to collaborate with us on research? Mail us!

Or would you like to invest in our company? We're looking for board members with an interest in making the world a better place. Please contact us!

Give us a shout!

We believe VR is going to open up a new dawn of mental health therapeutics. It's an exciting time for neuroscience, and if you're excited about it too, we'd love to hear from you. Please reach out to us. And check out our pitch deck (PDF).

Our values.

We like open source, freedom, pizza pie and chill sauce baby .

); };
